website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning product, this remarkable model has all the features any parent could ever want in a bib.
pros: Large design and adjustable Velcro strap equipped to fit children between 6 to 24 months
cons: Water-resistant backing can crack and peel over time

customer_reviews.title: 4 months into daily use, we need new ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 4 mo ths ago, we use them daily and have to clean them daily. The inner layer that makes this product water resistant is peeling off. They take a little while to dry out. They all have stained from regular food. They fold flat so they are easy to put in a diaper bag and take on the go, but these will not last daily use . We only use them for food. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Let's roll.

customer_reviews.title: Stop washing bibs
customer_reviews.text: Maybe you're like me, and you went through 2 or 3 fancy Aden & Anais or whatever bibs every day, and piled up a good 20 bibs that were washed every week. And then you heard about Bumkins. And you bought some, and you realized your whole bib collection was obsolete, because a single 3-pack is all you need. These don't need to be laundered. Just rinse in the sink and squeeze them out after each feeding. Or maybe you're not like me and you got it right the first time. Either way - for feeding, this is the bib you need. The cloth ones might be better for teething drool, but for messy high chair feedings, nothing beats this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great bibs for baby starting solids
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old son started solids so I wanted an easy bib to clean. This bib is just the right size- covers most of this upper body and is a thin plastic material that you can just wash off with a dish sponge and soap. The little pouch catches any spills or pieces that fall down. The design is super cute and a bonus for taking pictures of all the funny faces your baby will make when trying new foods. For now I definitely prefer these to the bulkier rubber bibs.
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Used Daily, Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Overall been a great bib for us, no significant complaints. Also purchased a pack with green floral, blue chevron, and dinosaurs. I'd buy a pack of solely dinosaur bibs if they were available at the time. Pros: Child tolerates it Captures about 85% of dropped food Easy to rinse off when finished Rolls up into a small bundle for travel Machine washes with no issue, very stain resistant Dries quickly Takes up little space (we hang from back of high chair using a command hook) Cons: The other 15% of the food she drops in her lap Doesn't have sleeves - which means it's tolerated for longer, but does expose arms to mess
customer_reviews.author: Emily Igawa

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I love these but my sons shirt can be damp under the bib if he really makes a mess which he usually does! It’s very convenient that you can just wipe the bib clean when you’re done and it’s pretty much dry by the next meal! I love the design and they are a nice size! My son is almost 8 months and these will fit or awhile. Also, the Velcro is super strong and he can’t pull it off no matter how hard he tries! Overall I’m glad I bought them, just wish there was some sort of liner on the backing!
customer_reviews.author: American Rose

customer_reviews.title: First time parent approved!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are awesome! We just started solid foods with my baby and the mess is unreal. He spits, smashes and drools all over these bibs and they hold up just fine! I wash them in the sink with the other dishes and hang to dry. So far, I'ce noticed so fading of the print and no discoloration from food if we don't get to wash it right away. The patterns are super cute. The velcro around his neck is long so you can adjust it easily for a quickly growing baby. The pocket is perfect at catching the food he drops and reducing the mess I need to clean up later. The price is great too! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bee

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs out there
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best bibs out there. They might be a little more expensive than other types but you will save money because they last forever. My set has gone through 4 years of daily use by two children. The best part is they can be washed and dried in the dryer! You can throw them in with your laundry without any problem. I can’t tell you how many other bibs I’ve accidentally put in the dryer and they were ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for meals!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are fabulous! We recently started our five month old on solids and were surprised to find how much banana stained his bibs. These are perfect for meal time: - LARGE (they cover his chest and shoulders) -So easy to clean. (I rinse them off right after meals and then throw them in the wash. It just takes a few seconds, and I imagine they are also very easily wiped clean) -Dry super quickly -Pocket for catching food (this is great since baby always wants to help and ends up knocking food off of the spoon) -And they’re adorable I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash, drys in seconds, good length
customer_reviews.text: If you want an easy to clean bib, this is the one. Very easy to wash it With your hands in between the meals and it drys very quick so it can be ready for the next meal. I love the size of it as well. I was looking for something not too short and not too long. This one is perfect for the first feedings. I believe that later on I will move to something that covers the hands as well but for now, this one is perfect. Cheap, easy to clean, cute prints. My baby seems to like it and he doesn’t try to take it off :)
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, adjustable, wide, no staining
customer_reviews.text: Love these bibs. Purées and solids stain my cloth bibs too easily, and I have no issues at all with that on these. They’re Velcro, but you can adjust the neck width to ensure the fullest coverage on baby’s neck and chest. They’re really wide (go well past my 13 mo’s shoulders) and completely cover the high chair straps too. They’re pretty long but don’t quite reach my toddler’s lap. I’ve washed them in both cold and warm water and then dried on low heat, and none of the bibs (I have 9!) show any sign of wear and tear. Overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these are good bibs. They can fit very snugly around the neck because of the adjustable velcro. They are waterproof, so no stains underneath. And the pouch does an ok job of catching fallen objects or drips. The reason I'm only giving 3 stars is because they have not held up well. I've been using these for 3 months and wash them about twice a week. One of them has already fallen apart (the waterproof lining on the back ripped apart), and the other two are noticeably worn. I expected these to hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to clean, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these bibs for the second child (they're on a pinkish side, and he's a bit, but he doesn't mind). They're super easy to clean (you can toss them in a washer, but usually it's not necessary, a quick rinse with a drop of dish soap is sufficient), very durable (more than three years of a use and abuse - they don't fall apart, don't peel, don't fade), soft (which means the bib doesn't bother a child as much as a rigid plastic/rubber one) and totally adorable. They're not very adsorbent, but they're waterproof and they've got a pocket to catch and retain pretty much everything liquid. I also love side closure. It's a simple and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are awesome! We bought them because our infant just started eating that soft cereal mixed with formula and she was making a mess. Her cotton bibs would start to stink really quick if we didn’t immediately soak them, so we decided to get something we could just rinse off and hang to dry. They work great and they even have little pockets at the bottom that catch any liquids or dropped food particles. This is very handy when dealing with a little mess making machine! I highly recommend these for anyone that is sick of having to soak their bibs immediately after feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon SpencerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these Bumkins Bibs after trying some others that ended up having to be thrown away after a few weeks. These are so easy to clean, I usually just throw them in the sink with some dishes and hang dry them. They dry pretty quickly too. They have fit our little one great and cover most of her while sitting in the highchair. When it comes to feedings I have yet to see any food soak through to stain clothes. All in all these have been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DaveandMickayla

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and keeps clothes clean...
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are great for babies and toddlers for meal time. I used to use the small cloth kind, and the bib and their clothes would get wet and stained, so I searched for an alternative. These are much bigger and can easily be wiped. All stains are gone after I wash them, and the best part is that the mess gets on the bib, not his clothes now. I also use them when we go out to eat at restaurants. My toddler refuses for us to feed him. He likes to explore and eat alone. It gets messy, but these bibs truly help with clean up and with protecting their clothes. They are also waterproof. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Knat

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for kids who insist on feeding themselves
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed by these bibs. My 18 month old is obsessed with feeding herself, so I got these to help keep her clothes clean from the inevitable mess. They are big and cover her entire upper half, so when she spills her clothes are safe. Being water proof and having the pocket saved me recently when my child decided to dump her water into her lap. The majority of it went into the pocket, and sure enough it was totally waterproof and didn't let any water out! I was honestly really surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great bibs!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs have been great for my growing little guy. I didn’t rate the absorbency because they’re plastic; they weren’t made to absorb. However, they are great! They’re big on his torso so they catch more food in the pouch, which I appreciate because, now that my guy wants to feed himself, the mess is endless. They’re also super easy to clean. If I’m out, all I need is a wipe and voila! all clean. As my guy grows, I feel like these bibs will stay with us for the long haul. So I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these! Got a few at Marshall's once, and then searched to find the same design. This is the only brand that does a great job of keeping clothes clean, being easy to wash off, and doesn't bunch up around my son's face. The silicone ones always limit his range of motion. Other vinyl type bibs bunch up around his face and annoy him, while not protecting his clothes. These are great, and sell for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Great baby/toddler bibs
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mealtime bibs. Waterproof, a pocket to catch crumbs, and easy velcro closure. For really wet foods, I sometimes use a cloth towel type bib over top of these to soak up drips. To keep your bibs in good condition, be sure to pull them out of the wash and set aside to air dry rather than putting them in the dryer. They still work after being dried in the dryer (I've done it many times) but after a while they start to curl and not be as soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best bibs ever! I wash them in the kitchen sink most days and throw them in the washing machine about once a week. The machine normally gets all the stains out! Very durable and the food catcher really works to catch most of the food that doesn't make it into baby's mouth. I noticed some bad reviews about them getting messed up in the dryer - DO NOT put them in the dryer!!!!! Duh, they are made with a bit of plastic and will melt. The labels and packaging all say that and to hang dry. I hate that these have a few bad reviews from people that can not read directions and use common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: Says they are stain proof and it stained on first use. The material is thin although my son dribbled juice everywhere and it didn’t leak through however the bug was very wet. Crumb catcher does work efficiently I was expecting a more durable fabric it seemed cheaply made I honestly found similar at the dollar store and loved it. The fit on this the neck doesn’t come all the way up and I was having to chance my sons shirt every meal anyway
customer_reviews.author: Holly Cash

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I have no idea what the deal is but these things get moldy SO easily. I purchased a few different sets of these and I’m so disappointed. I’ve already had to throw away 3. I’ve purchased different bibs with the expectation that eventually I’ll have to throw them all away from mold. Even the slightest amount of moisture on these things in an insane short amount of time and it’s just everywhere. It’s frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs Out There
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are the best out there in my opinion! I have used these for all 3 of my kids from the age of 6 months til around 4 years old. The pocket is great for catching dropped food and absorbs any messes, also easy to wipe clean after use. I usually use it for all 3 meals, then throw it in the washer after a days use. I wash them on a regular warm cycle and hang to dry. They are very long-lasting (I have had some that have lasted for 6 years and still going strong.)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite bibs! They cover just enough of baby’s shoulder to keep crotch goblin’s messy food face from mucking up his/her clothes at mealtime. And and and, it gets better, they are machine washable! Halle-freaking-lujah! 10/10 would recommend. If you buy other “wipe-able” plastic bibs, you’re dumb. Don’t worry, I am too because I did the same thing and then I found these. Don’t make my mistake; just buy these. You’re welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight bibs that keep baby dry
customer_reviews.text: These are great bibs. They're machine washable, catch most of what dribbles down my baby's chin, and dry quickly after a rinse. This is the second set of 3 I've purchased, because I wanted to have one at my mother's house, and one to keep in our diaper bag. The only downside I would say is that one of them may have started to mold inside the lining of my original set. It could be just a stain from blackberries, but I don't think so. My husband isn't always great at rinsing them out and hanging them up, so be diligent about that, and you shouldn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: JRussell

customer_reviews.title: The best bib for messy toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Best bibs by far. I only started using them when my child was around 11 months old. They have great shoulder coverage and overall width. Liquids have never seeped onto her clothes and I very much appreciate the ability to rinse, squeeze, and hang dry throughout the day between meals/snacks. They dry quickly too. My only frustration is that my daughter can yank them off even though the velcro is pretty durable. She just doesn't like wearing bibs. Wish they had adjustible snaps as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. Not absorbent, but that is what I wanted-carrots stain so badly! Just a faint orange tinge where carrots sit on these bibs. Wide enough to cover the shoulders (perfect for my busy bee who won’t stop looking around). Can scrub them with water and dish soap, or just wipe off big stuff. Bought to send to daycare with Little and I’m very pleased. Have a picket to catch big chunks and drips too. Super cute designs, and seem wheel stitched (one week in). Worth the money, def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the baby clean during meals
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves these as they are light, water repellant and easy to wash. This is our second order as they do wear out eventually. With constant use, they'll probably last 3-4 months before we get another set. We still use a cotton scarft made of old cotton T-shirts before we put on the bib. This was to prevent the baby from wetting her shirt during meals. The combo is pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: ChillenAzn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect really!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, short and simple! They are large but our kid's been using them since 6 months. The catch pocket is very useful, and the material is very easy to clean and quick to dry. I hand wash it daily and then throw it in the washer about once a week. This is our second set now, but the first set is still perfectly solid, we just wanted to have more of these to replace the small baby bibs we choose to give away.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C.

customer_reviews.title: Totally over the moon for these bibs!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE THE ALL-IN-ONE PERFECT FOOD BIB. I was worried I would have a meltdown if I had to scrub food out of one more onesie, so these saved my sanity. My little dude has a habit of turning to the side when eating and smearing his food-covered face all over his shoulders, but in these bibs it's on the bib and not his shirt! I was worried the pocket didn't flare out enough to catch everything he drops (or drools), but it seems to manage somehow. No food stains on pants. They rinse off easy in the sink. EVERYTHING A BIB SHOULD BE, plus the woodland design is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Well made; worth it
customer_reviews.text: Almost two years later, we are still using these bibs. I have “occasionally” (like twice) thrown them into the washing machine and let them drip dry. Most of the time we hand wash in our kitchen sink and let them drip dry in the dish drainer - just rinse and be done. Some discoloration after blueberries and squash, but no more than I’d expect from any bib. Still fairly soft - plastic has not become brittle; Velcro still works and hasn’t pulled off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nadreau

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adorable bibs!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Bumkins cloth diaper covers so I know this company is very reliable and known for its durable fabrics. These bibs met my expectations! They are adorable and easy to use and clean. You can wipe clean or wash with dish soap in your sink. Hang to dry. As durable a fabric as I expected from Bumkins! Will be buying more for a friend’s upcoming baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Maine Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these books with two kids and I can't say enough about how great they are! They are super light and fold really tiny in your diaper bag. When the kid is done making a mess you can just rinse it off and hang it to dry. 15 minutes later it's ready to go again. Also the pocket really does catch 90% of the dropped food, which keeps it off his lap! For the price, these are by far the best. I buy them for all my expecting friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable bibs
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second set for the baby because i liked them so much. They are light weight, easy to store (in comparison to the heavy silicone ones), easy to clean, and cute. I like the width of the bib size and the length. The little pocket easily catches stray food before it ends up on baby. I toss them in my washing machine many times and I’ve never had an issue with them wearing down.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love them-fits 6m old-room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets, the bear “feed me” and the dinosaur “hangry”. They are too cute, soft material, adjustable around the neck (long Velcro soft strip), and easy to wipe off. Love all three patterns that came in each pack, unlike some other brand packs which there’s always a “meh” or “ugly” style mixed in, I loved all of the ones I got. Fits my 6m old perfectly with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best Bibs Out There!
customer_reviews.text: Bumbkins bibs are my FAVORITE. The SuperBib is large, fully covering the front of my baby to protect his clothes from food and stains. Even though they say stain resistant, I felt skeptical when my baby had had beets and guava that gave the food a deep dark magenta color! The food wiped right off with no sign it was ever there. I bought another set as a baby shower gift. These bibs are A MUST HAVE for your little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good bibs!
customer_reviews.text: One of the better bib brands we have used. These are a thin waterproof material, not the heavy, thick plastic kind that my son always pulled off. I like how I can make the neck tight enough not to need a second bib underneath. They clean up easily. Pro tip: if they start to smell, boil them for ten minutes. The smell will be gone and the bibs don't have to be tossed out.
customer_reviews.author: wisewoman

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs out there!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! The perfect bibs! Not only are they the cutest, but they are machine-washable!! Great durability = Velcro does not wear out, even after months of being washed in the washing machine with other clothing. Air-dry, not for dryer. Also, it is adjustable!! So not only does it not fall off mid-meal, but nothing falls under the bib because you can adjust the fit around your kid's neck as they grow. My 1-year-old is still at the smallest neck size so these bibs will last into preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Cappuchica

customer_reviews.title: Great bib!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bibs! Waterproof, don’t stain, clean and dry easily! I only give it 4-stars because my 17 month old found out how to rip them off and now I have to use a binder clip over the Velcro to keep them on! A snap would be better than Velcro. So now I’m planning to buy the same brand, but the ones with sleeves and tie back! Hope they serve us well! You won’t regret buying these bibs! I still love them even though my little monster needs the other style at this stage!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bib
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST bibs for little ones that are starting solids. I love how soft and lightweight they are, and the velcro placement makes it much harder for baby to rip their own bib off. Best of all, they’re machine-washable! I don’t think you’re supposed to tumble dry them....but I have accidentally put one in the dryer and it was fine. The shiny material seems to repel stains well too. Stock up on these if you have a little one starting solids!
customer_reviews.author: ADB123

customer_reviews.title: Love these bibs!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about these bibs. My son is a small guy so these cover around the tops of his shoulders and his entire torso. Perfect for keeping messes off his clothes! He still manages to spill water in between the gap of his neck, soaking his shirt but oh well. Clean up is a breeze, just rinse it off in the sink and ring it out. Dries super quick so it's ready to go for the next feeding. I'm getting multiple uses put of each bib before they really need to be washed which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I must say that the umbrellas are my favorite! The material is waterproof to protect clothing and ...
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are my current favorites. I have Bumkins SuperBibs in several prints, however, I must say that the umbrellas are my favorite! The material is waterproof to protect clothing and the pocket collects whatever happens to miss little mouths... which in our case is most of the meal. The sizing is ample enough to cover the most often soiled areas. They can be easily hand washed but I usually just throw them in the washing machine (after emptying the pocket). They still look as good as new, even after several washings.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bibs are waterproof and make wiping food off a breeze. That being said, the pocket on this bib does not stay open or catch a drop of food. We have a small waterproof mat under a highchair to catch all of our food crumbs which we them sweep up. Children are messy and life is short, this bib does the job. I mainly like these bibs for there prints. There are more effective bibs out there.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Mom  ïß

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Baby's Clothes Stain Free!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of these bibs seems thin but don't be discouraged - they are very durable and will protect your baby (and their clothing) from 100% of the sloppiest messes! The wider fit covers the shoulders - perfect for curious little ones who enjoy looking around during meal time (and dribbling food in the process). The fabric is pretty much water resistant so they can be easily wiped cleaned allowing a few uses before they need to be washed. I use the Velcro to hang them from my 6 month old's high chair. Baby girl in photo is 6mos old and in 50th percentile height/weight.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, quaility materials!
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy to wipe clean thin plastic bibs. The pocket at the bottom catches food and keeps it from landing on your baby/toddler's lap. With a velcro closure it makes it easy to put on, and take off. I bought these for my daughter 5 years ago and just passed them on to my granddaughter. Built to last, quaility materials!
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Love these bibs!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are large and cover a lot of area, easy Velcro closure with long strip to adjust to many sizes, very easy to clean with just a wipe, but still machine washable, waterproof, didn’t stain from orange sweet potatoes!, and it doesn’t sound crinkly like the cheap plastic bibs. I am definitely getting more of these for my messy little monster!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: great bib
customer_reviews.text: wish there were more color choices. we got the grey white zigzag for our son because i cant stand other busy prints. anyway, this works well and is bigger than most others which is a good thing. pocket catches food and water spillage and this washes clean in sink or in washing machine. we havent had issues with staining at all. great product.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: These keep messes contained!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old was growing out of her newborn bibs and I was looking for bibs that would help contain the mess in addition to keeping it off her clothes. These for the bill nicely with their added pocket, which helps catch food that is dropped. The material is very stain resistant and easy to clean. They look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used one of the bibs for the first time today, I was looking for one that didn’t leave a gap at my daughter’s collar that would mess up her clothes and so far, this is working out great. Easy to clean, has a large surface area that covers her, and the patterns are so cute. I wish we had bought these sooner instead of changing our kid’s clothes after every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Jenalyn Lorenzo Chin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bibs
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, sturdy bibs. Large coverage for our little one's messy eating. We use them when she's eating solids because they are easy to give a quick rinse and toss in the washer for whenever we run the next load. Cloth bibs don't work as well because they hold in moisture and start stinking while sitting in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: lightninglesley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby just learning to eat!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old that just started solids so needless to say food goes everywhere. These bibs are perfect! They are big enough to cover all of her and they rinse clean so all the applesauce goes in the sink, not all over her clothes! If you are looking for drool bibs dont get these - they dont absorb anything.
customer_reviews.author: CasRy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean & LARGE
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean & catches (some) food if it misses LO's mouth. I have been able to just rinse after use & let it air dry. I'm sure they can be put in the washing machine, which I will do at some point to really clean them. They are very large compared to other bibs, which I love. I would definitely recommend these over other bibs. The only con I have noticed is that the pocket kind of stays closed. You will have to open the pocket to make sure you are catching some food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica VazquezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I just started my six month old on solids, which can be a mess. The cloth bibs she had just absorbed the food that missed her mouth and had to be washed after every use. I'm so happy I found these Bibsters. The mess stays on the bib, doesn't soak through. I just rinse off the bib after each feeding and by the time the next one comes along, it's dry. I went from using three bibs a day just for food, to one using Bibsters. I will be ordering more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Immy Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Great for going out!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these bibs! They are perfect for putting in the diaper bag as they rub clean! We take them out for dinners! The pocket is a nice added touch! Biggest complaint is after one wash(followed manufacturers directions, washed separately with my daughters clothes and hung to dry) the always hungry started coming off! It still functions the same though.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Buck

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs but the absorbency on them is okay but for the price and getting them in a pack was good enough for me. It’s very cute on my six month old son. I usually clean them off with wipes after feeding but besides that I throw them in the washer and dryer at certain points of it’s usage. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bamba

customer_reviews.title: Cute, absorbant, wash well, and cover entire torso!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bib. We have started solids and these bibs are BIG which I love, especially because more food lands on the bib than her mouth. These bibs cover my child’s entire torso and part of her lap. They are soft, easy to wipe clean, and wash well in the washing machine. This is my second pack. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Cute designs and easy to throw in a diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs. These are my second set. I would recommend washing them in the sink, rather than putting them in the washer. We had put the first set in the washer and the material on the back started to come off. We just use dish soap and clean it in the sink and that seems to do the trick. Overall I really like these bibs. They are easy to fold up and throw in a diaper bag. They come in adorable designs, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bibs
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bibs. They're thin, easy to put away, take on inevitable spills without soaking through (unless there's a lot of liquid, which one should expect), are a good size (covering our toddler's torso), and have a much needed pocket. I wash them in the sink throughout the week and toss them in the wash along with the rest of the laundry and they fare just fine. This is our second set and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Baby must have
customer_reviews.text: Great bibs. Keeps baby dry and clean. Bibs are easy to clean, just a dap of soap, a quick rub, rinse, and hang dry. These bibs fold up nice and flat/small so they take up minimum space in the diaper bag. Great price for reusable bibs that will last a very long time, I've been using the same one for a month and it still looks brand new. I would recommend cleaning with soupy water right after use to minimize staining, I've done this and I'm sure it's why mine still looks so new.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Segura

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are great- they don’t soak up liquid, but repel it which I prefer. They are a nice size and I like that they have the little pouch to catch dropped pieces. The patterns are great. My only real complaint is they have gotten rather stained, but given that they are bibs that is fine as they have protected his clothes well.
customer_reviews.author: Micheline Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Better than all the other bibs I have
customer_reviews.text: Great product, better than others. First, it does not need a wash machine, I always wash it after feeding my baby and it dries before the second feed. Second, size is good. All my other bibs are too small although looks very fancy, and these bibs can hardly cover my baby even she is only seven month old.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeQQ

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Bumkins bibs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Bumkins bibs! I have used them for many years in a daycare, and they hold up so well, cover where they need to cover, and last a long time.Most days I just wipe them off, but if there is a messy toddler, I will swish it around in my dishwater then hang to dry. Super easy. The only thing that could make these better would be a snap closure. That being said, the velcro holds up just fine on these. My personal preference is for snap closures.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several different bib brands and this is by far my favorite. After several uses the others stained and lost its shape. I had to throw the others away. This brand although it looks used now after many many many uses it hasn’t lost its shape, stained, and it dries quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite bib once they eat food
customer_reviews.text: They are my favorite bibs for 6 mos onwards, hands down. They are the right size, easy to clean, and have a nice pocket to catch spills. Tried lots of other ones, and bought these all over again for kid #3 after using them (and then passing them along) for my twins. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it 4 stars only because the description says stain resistant. I personally could care less if it was stained (which they are) but only noted that in case it’s important to you. I love the coverage of these bibs. We’ve used them for months and I wash them in the washing machine and hang to dry. They’re still in perfect condition other than stains. Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs! We have had them for a couple of months and I am ordering more. They are soft yet sturdy. I usually just wash them along with my dishes and hang them in the dish rack to dry. I have also washed them in the washing machine and they have remained sturdy. The little pocket is great for catching food and keeping my 1 year olds clothes clean and dry. The velcro is longer so that you can tighten or loosen the neck area to your childs comfort. I have been through a lot of bibs over the years, but these Bumpkins remain my favorite. As usual, Amazon Prime delivered them right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and that it's very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Love the shoulder coverage it provides on my 8 month old, and the fact that it is lightweight. I originally bought the oxo tot bibs, which are great for me bc they protect my baby and catch lots of dripped food, but the bottom rubber catchall pouch makes the bib heavier, and my guy hates wearing it. He tolerates these no problem!! But the pouch doesn't catch nearly as much since it doesn't always stay open. Giving it 5 stars anyway since it works well for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs!
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom, I was confused about the difference between drool bibs and food bibs. These are the PERFECT food bibs. If your little one is starting solids, purchase these. You can easily wipe them clean or put them in the dishwasher. They fold up easily, so they are easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My kid is a messy eater, but whose kid isn’t? I love these! They are not to expensive, they are super easy to clean. Some days I am able to rinse and lay to dry rather than place in the wash. They are usually dry and ready to be used again by the next meal. He’s been practicing his sippy cup drinking. I have to say that the bibs do not absorb all of that liquid and he still gets his clothes wet, but with wet foods, he’s been fine!
customer_reviews.author: K Akes

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and they don’t stain
customer_reviews.text: Love these bibs. They cover my baby’s torso and keep her clean while she eats. The pocket catches a good bit of food if she misses her mouth. They don’t seem to stain even when covered in avocado or strawberries. Easy to clean with a baby wipe and still look brand new after a few times in the washing machine
customer_reviews.author: hrsc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy washable bibs. Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are my very favorite bibs. I tried about 4 different brands and finally landed on these. The sizes perfect and fits both babies and toddlers. The pocket is the perfect size to catch spills or dropped pieces. They are machine washable and dryable which is a must for me. They hold up very well in the wash and dryer. I have purchased several of these and recommend them to all my friendships
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: These bibs are great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered these. They are a larger sized bib covering the entire front of my daughter so nothing gets on her clothes while eating. The material is perfect for keeping messy food off of her and are easy to wipe off and clean. Finally a bib that will hopefully save some of her outfits from stains!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easier than the silicone bibs
customer_reviews.text: We struggled to snap on the silicone bib every time we were feeding our baby. These bibs still have the pocket design to catch (most) crumbs and they are easy to rinse or shake out after every meal. We wash them every few days and they are not stained at all. Also pack up very small for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy O.

customer_reviews.title: These are great! This is best for when you start solids
customer_reviews.text: These are great! This is best for when you start solids. You can wash in the kitchen sink and hang to dry (they dry fast). Also, they protect the clothing unless baby gets food on the sleeves (they have a sleeve version of these bibs also). We only needed 2 of these, but the extra one goes in our diaper bag. We are happy with them so far and it's been 5 weeks since we have been using them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Some staining.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. The pouch catches most of the food and liquid. They are easy to clean. Some staining though. Husband put them in the dryer and they lost some of their repellent quality but that’s his fault not the company’s. He didn’t listen to me. What are you gonna do?
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Allen

customer_reviews.title: BEST bibs ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bumkins are the BEST bibs ever!!!! They are soft, light weight, durable, dry faster than you'd believe, fold up super tiny to tuck away in a bag, the are colorful, cute designs, perfect size, the velcro stays, i throw them in the washer and they're fine...they are the best! other bibs i've bought at various baby stores - they're hard plastic, take forever to dry, smell bad...honestly some look pretty cute but they're just not functional enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bibs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bibs for my 18 months old daughter at meal time. They are efficient in catching items that may fall to the floor. They do stain. My daughter eats orange and all 3 of the bibs are stained with the orange juice. I would still repurchase and we still use them now that she is 2.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute packable bibs
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are cute and work well. They can be folded down super small so they are easy to bring with. The pocket catches most falling food. The only thing is that mine will smell in my bag if I’m not careful. I wipe them down thoroughly with wipes after each meal, but they still sometimes smell.
customer_reviews.author: BagLady

customer_reviews.title: Mold spots
customer_reviews.text: I bought bibs from this same company before. Their other bibs lasted a very long time. This time, it’s only been a year and for some strange reason one of the bibs started getting black mold spots. I hand wash and dry them just like before. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved the designs on these bibs (huge reason for choosing ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the designs on these bibs (huge reason for choosing them) but they didn’t hold up as well as I’d hoped. The “waterproofing film” (that’s the closest description I can think of) on the back of the bibs came off when washing. I almost ALWAYS washed by hand and after a short time, the film would come off in globs like boogers (sorry but that’s what it resembled to me). Not a deal breaker, just annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. The bibs are easy to put on the child. They are easy to clean. The pocket catches food that would otherwise end up in the highchair or on the floor. They are not absorbent or soft, but they are not designed to be that.
customer_reviews.author: Gill Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bibs!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, I have 1000000+ cloth bibs that I have been given. I hate all 1000000+ that I have. You can never get the stain out and They always look dirty. I bought these hoping that plastic bid would work better and guess what, THEY TOTALLY DID!! They are so easy to clean and for the most part, they catch most of the food in the pocket. I throw these in while I’m washing dishes and hang dry. These also dry quick! Which is another bonus. I will for sure be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Earl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We use these daily. They fold up so small and are super light, have generous coverage. Great for diaper bag or vacation. Only complaint is that with daily use and washing the thin silicone lining to the pocket is starting to peel, so not that waterproof after 6 months, but we love them and ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: lucky_pez

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are so great and easy to clean. I just wash under the sink and leave to dry and they are ready for the next feeding time. The pocket is great at collecting items. I have had no problems with them falling apart, they look new each time I use them. The patterns are all so cute....I want more:)
customer_reviews.author: jlow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BIBS
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Bumkin bibs. They fabric is soft/satiny, they are water resistant, they are adjustable for neck size, the patterns/colors are vibrant and cute, easy to wipe down and/or toss in the washer. They are exactly what I wanted/was searching for.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Large and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Large, so it protects clothing. Easy to clean, just wipe with a wet towel or rinse in the sink. Waterproof / water resistant Durable, can definitely last through multiple children The little pocket stays flat most of the time so it doesn't catch solids very well but liquids usually get stopped.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: These are far superior to those gross plastic bibs with the backside that ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over six months now. These are far superior to those gross plastic bibs with the backside that is cloth. These are easy to clean. I just rinse them under water and hang dry for later. They dry quick, ten minutes top. They even wash well in the washing machine. I rotate using all three each day for every meal time. The bottom pocket has saved me from cleaning up extra mess. Wish the Velcro was a little stronger, when my daughter is in a mood she can easily rip off the bib. Doesn't happen often, but is the only down side I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great for when they start on solids.
customer_reviews.text: these are my favorite bibs for when the babies are eating solids. They cover a large portion of their fronts, and the neck is adjustable so you can get it tight enough that stuff doesn't drip down underneath the neck line. They are wipeable for little messes, or you can put them in the washing machine for big messes. They are not absorbent, so if you are looking for bibs for young babies/ bottle feeding, they would be less useful.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Daycare recommended these, I can see why
customer_reviews.text: Asked the infant teacher at our daycare if she had a favorite brand of bibs for babies who spit up a lot and she said these ones. I can see why; they are not as heavy as the silicone ones I've see, and they are very wide so catch a lot more than the dainty bandana bibs we used with our first kid. Just be careful when you toss your load of kid laundry into the wash, these can scortch/melt!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lamoreaux

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I didn’t have these from the beginning! These fit my chunky little baby without any issues, they are cute and the best part is, I can throw them in my sink and wash them instead of adding bibs to my already overflowing laundry. Would buy these over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Food still gets to clothing
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean, cover my baby’s chest completely. The downfall is that it doesnt seem to matter how I put them on he still gets food that rolls from the drool under the bib and gets all over clothing. Additionally, because of drool the food/drool mess leaves little ‘puddles’ that roll off onto sleeves and pants. I end up putting a cotton bib under this one which defeats the purpose of buying them in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kycarah

customer_reviews.title: High Quality bibs
customer_reviews.text: Beyond excellent, and very durable I use them in my toddler classroom, and have for years. They wash up nicely by hand or in the washer, and dry quickly. With 8 toddlers they are washed many times per week. Size is perfect area well covered and a crumb pocket to catch what falls
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these bibs. They catch solid food. That's about it. They stain easily and getting them out is next to impossible. They barely stop liquid from going through. Very disappointed... so cute but not very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy doopy

customer_reviews.title: Best bibs, hands down
customer_reviews.text: We love these bibs! They are so easy to clean and I love the food catcher at the bottom. They are comfortable for my son to wear and keeps him as clean as he's going to be when feeding himself. I love that you can throw them in the washing machine. Just buy them. You won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these colorful bibs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was tired of the cloth bibs getting stained. These are easy to wipe down. I use them a few times then I toss them in the wash and hang to dry. The velcro in the back is durable, not easy for my 1 year old to rip off. I love the vibrant colors. Will purchase more in the future when my unborn son starts eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good bibs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and so far hasn't kept any stains. Velcro is strong. Very durable. Covers entire chest area for my toddler. Been using SkipHop brand and the design faded and Velcro wore out easily. These have held up better than the SkipHop ones so far.
customer_reviews.author: Crista C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these bibs
customer_reviews.text: Love these bibs. After a meal I rinse them in the sink and hang to dry on the dishrack. By next mealtime they are dry and ready to go. The only issue I've had is if milk gets spilled on them they can retain a sour smell if you don't soak and then wash in the washing machine. The pocket is good for helping to catch food too.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Read cleaning instructions!... do not dry!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really really liked these bibs... until I realized I shouldn’t be drying it in the dryer. I do realize now that it says to hang dry it, but I never would have guessed That this baby item wasn’t supposed to be dried, until i pulled it out of the dryer (low heat cycle) and the back was melted and delaminates. My fault, but I’m my opinion all baby bibs should be dry-able.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: best bibs ever made
customer_reviews.text: only one star for absorbency because that's just it, they don't absorb. The food wipes off with ease. They look brand new still. I have ones from my first kid that we still use and she is turning 5! same color and everything. amazing.
customer_reviews.author: michelle k

customer_reviews.title: Backing peels off
customer_reviews.text: I loved these until about a month in and the backing started coming off the back. The washing instructions say wash in warm water and hang to dry. We may have washed them in slightly hot water but have not dried them and the backing is rendering them useless. Disappointing because everything else about them is great but I can’t buy new bibs every month. I plan to return them as they are still in the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

product_meta.title: Bumkins SuperBib, Baby Bib, Waterproof, Washable, Stain and Odor Resistant, 6-24 Months, 3-Pack - Always Hungry, Feed Me, Good Vibes
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 3| Color:Always Hungry, Feed Me, Good VibesBumkins SuperBibs save you from the mess! The SuperBib attaches over the back of the shoulder with hook and loop for a quick, adjustable and tug-proof fit. With a handy crumb catcher / catch-all pocket for containing spills. Made from Bumkins lightweight, waterproof, easy-wipe, stain and odor resistant fabric. Single ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. Without a cotton layer, stains and smells don't stick. Wipeable and machine washable for easy cleaning so you can use it over and over again! Plus, it’s safe to use. Our bibs are BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free. Sized to fit ages 6 to 24 months. Measures approximately 10” across and 9” from neck down. Designed in Arizona, responsibly made in China.
feature_bullets: FITS 6 TO 24 MOS – The SuperBib attaches over the back of the shoulder with hook and loop for a quick, adjustable and tug-proof fit. With a handy crumb catcher / catch-all pocket for containing spills. Measures approximately 10” across and 9” from neck down. Wipeable and machine washable for easy cleaning so you can use it over and over again!

SAVING YOU FROM MESSES – Made from Bumkins lightweight, waterproof, easy-wipe, stain and odor resistant fabric. Single-ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. Without a cotton layer, stains and smells don't stick.
SOFT YET STRONG – Our signature fabric is both durable and soft, our bibs stand up to messes, yet are lightweight and comfortable.
LAB TESTED SAFE – At Bumkins, we take pride in our rigorous product testing to ensure you have the safest possible products. Our bibs are BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free.
EASY-TO-CLEAN – Machine washable. Turn pocket inside-out to wash. To extend the life of our bibs, we recommend hang drying our quick-dry fabric.
ABOUT OUR FABRIC – 100% polyester, lightweight and breathable with embedded TPU for waterproofing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,481 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
